com.example.joshua.ljc.DataModel

Class Testimonial

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.joshua.ljc.DataModel.Testimonial
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITestimonial

    public class Testimonial
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITestimonial
    Created by Joshua on 01/04/2017. The "Testimonial" object represents the testimonials given by the construction companies clients (or other companies that have interacted with this business).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Testimonial()
      This is the default constructor for a clients testimonial.
      Testimonial(java.lang.String authorName, java.lang.String authorQuote)
      This constructor facilitates the creation of a full testimonial object.
      Testimonial(java.lang.String authorName, java.lang.String authorQuote, java.lang.String id) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      This gets a testimonial's author's full name.

      Gets the quote made by the author.

      Gets the Fire Base key where the testimonial is stored.
      boolean setName(java.lang.String authorName)
      Sets the client's name which is attached to a testimonial.
      boolean setQuoteString(java.lang.String authorQuote)
      Sets the body of the testimonial, the authors name will remain unchanged.
      boolean setUUID(java.lang.String id)
      Sets the key for where the testimonial will be stored in Fire Base.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Testimonial

        public Testimonial()
        This is the default constructor for a clients testimonial. This can be used to create a Fire Base key, allowing the rest of the testimonial details to be added later.

      • Testimonial

        public Testimonial(java.lang.String authorName,
                   java.lang.String authorQuote)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This constructor facilitates the creation of a full testimonial object. This includes both the authors full name and their quote/testimonial in regard to the services provided by JLC Construction.
        Parameters:
        authorName - String value which represents the full name of the testimonial's author.
        authorQuote - String value of the clients quote. Note: The client should confirm that they are happy for this quote to be published.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if either of the string variables don't meet the minimum requirements needed to keep the data consistent and valid.

      • Testimonial

        public Testimonial(java.lang.String authorName,
                   java.lang.String authorQuote,
                   java.lang.String id)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        authorName -
        authorQuote -
        id -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setName

        public boolean setName(java.lang.String authorName)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ITestimonial
        Sets the client's name which is attached to a testimonial.
        Specified by:
        setName in interface ITestimonial
        Parameters:
        authorName - String value representing a clients full name (should be the author of the testimonial).
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value which represents whether the testimonial's author's name was successfully changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if the new author name doesn't meet the minimum requirements e.g. length > 3, etc.

      • getQuote

        Description copied from interface: ITestimonial
        Gets the quote made by the author.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • setQuoteString

        public boolean setQuoteString(java.lang.String authorQuote)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ITestimonial
        Sets the body of the testimonial, the authors name will remain unchanged.
        Specified by:
        setQuoteString in interface ITestimonial
        Parameters:
        authorQuote - The String value which represents the actual quote made by a client.
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value, representing whether the quote was actually successfully changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if the new quote doesn't exist or doesn't meet a certain length.

      • getUUID

        public java.lang.String getUUID()
        Description copied from interface: ITestimonial
        Gets the Fire Base key where the testimonial is stored. This is used for updates and removals.
        Specified by:
        getUUID in interface ITestimonial
        Returns:
        String value of the Fire Base key.

      • setUUID

        public boolean setUUID(java.lang.String id)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ITestimonial
        Sets the key for where the testimonial will be stored in Fire Base.
        Specified by:
        setUUID in interface ITestimonial
        Parameters:
        id - The String value of the new Fire Base directory (Key).
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean value, representing whether the Fire Base key was successfully changed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - This exception is thrown if the key is null, which means Fire Base was unable to generate a key.
